generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans+KR:wght@100;300;400;500;700;900&display=swap");*{margin:0;padding:0}html{font-family:Noto Sans KR;color:#333}a,li,ol,ul{list-style:none;color:inherit;text-decoration:none}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-weight:400}.img{position:relative}a,img{display:block}img{width:100%;height:auto}button{background:none;border:none;display:block}h1{font-size:36px;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase}.tab_list,h1{text-align:center;margin-bottom:15px}.tab_list .header_inner{height:100px;position:relative;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;color:#333}.header .header_inner .logo{width:140px;padding-left:10px;padding-right:120px}.header .header_inner .logo svg{fill:#333}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul{display:flex}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li{box-sizing:border-box;height:100px;padding:0 20px}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li:nth-child(3){padding-right:40px}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li:nth-child(4){padding-left:40px}.header .gnb>ul>li>a{position:relative;padding-top:30px;line-height:40px;font-size:20px;font-weight:700;border-bottom:1px solid hsla(0,0%,100%,0);transition:.2s}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li:hover>a{border-bottom:1px solid #333}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover{width:100%;position:absolute;left:0;top:100px;background-color:#fff;display:none}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover a{display:inline}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover a:hover{color:#0e0057;border-bottom:1px solid #0e0057}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover .gnb_brand>a:hover{border-bottom:0}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover .gnb_brand>a:hover .img{overflow:hidden}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover .gnb_brand>a:hover .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover>div>div:first-child{border-right:1px solid #aaa}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover>div .gnb_center>div{width:25%;box-sizing:border-box;padding-left:30px;border-right:1px solid #aaa}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover .gnb_kids{justify-content:start}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover .gnb_kids .gnb_center{width:735px}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover .gnb_kids .gnb_center>div{width:33.3333333333%}.header .header_inner .gnb>ul>li .gnb_hover .gnb_kids .gnb_brand p{margin-top:20px;font-size:20px;text-align:center}.header .header_inner .user_menu>ul{width:270px;display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.header .header_inner .user_menu>ul span{width:60px;height:60px;line-height:60px;text-align:center;font-size:40px;color:#333}.banner{width:1320px;margin:0 ul{position:absolute;bottom:10px;display:flex;color:#fff;font-size:36px;font-weight:700}.product_list{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.product_list .product{width:calc(25% - 15px);margin-right:20px;margin-bottom:20px}.product_list .product:nth-child(4n){margin-right:0}.product_list .product .img{background-color:#000;overflow:hidden}.product_list .product .img img{width:100%}.product_list .product .img:hover .icon{bottom:0}.product_list .product .img .icon{position:absolute;bottom:-100%;transition:.3s;display:flex;width:100%;background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.5)}.product_list .product .img .icon button{display:block;width:50%;text-align:center;cursor:pointer;padding:10px 0;position:relative}.product_list .product .img .icon button span{transition:.2s}.product_list .product .img .icon button.cart_btn:after{content:"";width:1px;height:80%;position:absolute;background-color:#777;top:10%;right:0}.product_list .product .img .icon button.cart_btn:hover span{color:#1e1ec0}.product_list .product .img .icon button.heart_btn:hover span{color:#f44}.product_list .product .img .icon button span{font-size:50px}.product_list .product .product_info .info_name{font-size:20px;font-weight:700}.footer{background-color:#eee}.footer>div>div{margin-bottom:40px;padding-bottom:40px}.footer>div>div:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.footer .foot_top{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.footer .foot_top .foot_brand{width:200px}.footer .foot_top .foot_brand .img{margin-bottom:50px;fill:#0e0057}.footer .foot_top .foot_brand p{line-height:50px;text-align:center;font-size:24px}.footer .foot_top .foot_menu{width:calc(100% - 440px)}.footer .foot_top .foot_menu>ul{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.footer .foot_top .foot_menu>ul>li{width:20%;flex-grow:1;margin-right:20px;text-align:center}.footer .foot_top .foot_menu>ul>li:last-child{margin-right:0}.footer .foot_top .foot_menu>ul>li>a{font-size:20px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:20px}.footer .foot_top .foot_menu>ul>li li{padding:10px 0}.footer .foot_top .foot_sns{width:200px}.footer .foot_top .foot_sns ul{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.footer .foot_top .foot_sns ul li{width:25%}.footer .foot_top .foot_sns ul li svg{padding:15px;box-sizing:border-box;width:60px;height:60px}.footer .foot_mid{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.footer .foot_mid>p{width:calc(20% - 16px);margin-right:20px}.footer .foot_mid>p:nth-child(5n){margin-right:0}.footer .foot_mid>p:nth-child(7) a{color:red}.footer .foot_mid>p:nth-child(9) a{color:#00f}.footer .foot_mid>p a{height:50px;line-height:50px;text-align:center}.footer .foot_mid>p a:hover{text-decoration:underline}.footer .foot_bottom{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.footer .foot_bottom .copyright{width:calc(50% - 10px);margin-right:20px;padding-top:30px}.footer .foot_bottom .copyright p{color:#aaa}.footer .foot_bottom .copyright p span{color:#aaa;text-decoration:underline;cursor:pointer;font-size:14px;padding:0 10px}.footer .foot_bottom .cs{width:calc(50% - 10px)}.footer .foot_bottom .cs .center{width:260px;height:50px;text-align:center;line-height:50px;font-size:30px;font-weight:700;border:1px solid #333;border-radius:50px;margin:0 auto 10px}.footer .foot_bottom .cs .contact{width:260px;margin:0 auto}.footer .foot_bottom .cs .contact h4{font-size:24px;font-weight:700}.footer .foot_bottom .cs .contact p{font-size:14px;font-weight:700}
